name: Apollo Justice: Turnabout Substitution
storyline: Judge Chambers has been accused of murdering an infamous serial killer in his prison cell. With no one else to turn to, he hires rookie attorney Apollo Justice as his defense. He's soon joined by cheerful funeral director Rhea Wits as his assistant as they investigate the strange twists and turns of the case. But as always, things are not as simple as they appear, and the case soon takes an unexpected direction. If Apollo's going to unravel the truth, he'll need to hold his own against an impossibly tough prosecutor and face horrible truths he may not be ready for...
summary:
Apollo Justice Turnabout Substitution is a fancase developed for PyWright. 
The game is set shortly after "Turnabout Succession" and was intended to act as a fifth case to the original game. 
 
When the city's most famous judge gets arrested on suspicion of murdering an infamous serial killer, he has no one to turn to but rookie attorney Apollo Justice. 
But is he up to the task? Can he find the truth on his own? And, above all, can he face it?
